selectedVerses.text: But his wife said to him, "If the LORD had meant to kill us, he would not have accepted a burnt offering and a grain offering at our hands, or shown us all these things, or now announced to us such things as these."
Now Jesus had spoken of his death, but they thought that he meant taking rest in sleep.
then you shall do to him as he had meant to do to his brother. So you shall purge the evil from your midst.
And hearing a crowd going by, he inquired what this meant.
Or do you presume on the riches of his kindness and forbearance and patience, not knowing that God's kindness is meant to lead you to repentance?
